src: Ford accepts the fait accompli with good grace.
mt: Ford menerima fait accompli itu dengan lapang dada.
backtranslation: Ford accepted the fait accompli gracefully.

src: Falstaff, pleased to find himself not the only dupe, proclaims that all the world is folly, and all are figures of fun ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Everything in the world is a jest... but he laughs well who laughs the final laugh").
mt: Falstaff, senang karena bukan dia satu-satunya yang tertipu, menyatakan bahwa seluruh dunia adalah kebodohan, dan semua orang adalah bahan tertawaan ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Segala sesuatu di dunia adalah lelucon... tetapi dia tertawa dengan baik yang tertawa di akhir.").
backtranslation: Falstaff, pleased that he is not the only one fooled, declares that the whole world is foolishness, and everyone is a laughing stock ("Tutto nel mondo è burla.... Tutti gabbati!.... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Everything in the world is a joke... but he laughs well who laughs at the end.").

src: The entire company repeats his proclamation in an exuberant ten-voice fugue.
mt: Seluruh perusahaan mengulangi proklamasinya dalam sebuah fuga sepuluh suara yang riuh.
backtranslation: The entire company repeated its proclamation in a boisterous fuga of ten voices.

src: They won all their group matches to finish top of the pool.
mt: Mereka memenangkan semua pertandingan grupnya untuk finis di puncak klasemen.
backtranslation: They won all their group matches to finish at the top of the table.

src: After defeating France in the quarter-finals, they lost to the eventual tournament winners South Africa in the semi-finals.
mt: Setelah mengalahkan Prancis di perempat final, mereka kalah dari Afrika Selatan yang akhirnya menjadi juara turnamen di semifinal.
backtranslation: After beating France in the quarterfinals, they lost to eventual tournament champions South Africa in the semifinals.

src: The arrangement of Thiele and Ladiges was not accepted by George, and was discarded in his 1999 revision.
mt: Susunan Thiele dan Ladiges tidak diterima oleh George, dan dibuang dalam revisinya pada tahun 1999.
backtranslation: Thiele and Ladiges' arrangement was not accepted by George, and was discarded in his 1999 revision.

src: Under George's 1999 arrangement, B. epica's placement was as follows:
mt: Berdasarkan pengaturan George tahun 1999, penempatan B. epica adalah sebagai berikut:
backtranslation: Based on George's 1999 regulation, the placement of B. epica is as follows:

src: The Outsider also grants his mark, and special abilities, to other characters.
mt: The Outsider juga memberikan tanda dan kemampuan spesialnya kepada karakter lain.
backtranslation: The Outsider also gives his mark and special abilities to other characters.

src: Smith described the character as an amoral figure who grants abilities, but leaves the choice of how to use them up to the recipient.
mt: Smith menggambarkan karakter tersebut sebagai sosok amoral yang memberikan kemampuan, tetapi menyerahkan pilihan tentang cara menggunakannya kepada penerima.
backtranslation: Smith portrays the character as an amoral figure who grants abilities, but leaves the choice of how to use them to the recipient.

src: Devil May Cry begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).
mt: Devil May Cry dimulai dengan Dante (Drew Coombs) yang diserang di kantornya oleh seorang wanita misterius bernama Trish (Sara Lafleur).
backtranslation: Devil May Cry begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).

src: He impresses her by easily brushing off her assault, and explains that for years, he has hunted demons in pursuit of the ones who killed his mother and brother.
mt: Dia membuatnya terkesan dengan dengan mudah menangkis serangannya, dan menjelaskan bahwa selama bertahun-tahun, dia telah memburu iblis untuk mengejar orang-orang yang membunuh ibu dan saudara laki-lakinya.
backtranslation: He impressed her by easily parrying her attacks, and explained that for years, he had been hunting demons to pursue the people who killed his mother and brother.

src: Trish explains that her attack was a test, and that the demon emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the deaths of his family, is planning to cross over into the human world after centuries of imprisonment.
mt: Trish menjelaskan bahwa serangannya adalah sebuah ujian, dan bahwa kaisar iblis Mundus (Tony Daniels), yang Dante anggap bertanggung jawab atas kematian keluarganya, berencana untuk menyeberang ke dunia manusia setelah berabad-abad dipenjara.
backtranslation: Trish explains that her attack was a test, and that the demon emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the death of his family, plans to cross over to the human world after centuries of imprisonment.

src: Rainbow is a documentary filmmaker.
mt: Rainbow adalah seorang pembuat film dokumenter.
backtranslation: Rainbow is a documentary filmmaker.

src: Liz O'Rourke says she is now working with the mentally disabled (although she is later revealed to be a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").
mt: Liz O'Rourke mengatakan bahwa dia sekarang bekerja dengan penyandang disabilitas mental (meskipun kemudian terungkap bahwa dia adalah seorang bidan dalam episode "Father Figure").
backtranslation: Liz O'Rourke said that she now works with people with mental disabilities (although it was later revealed that she was a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").

src: Trish Skye says she had problems but has been clean and sober for two years; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.
mt: Trish Skye mengatakan bahwa ia pernah memiliki masalah, tetapi sudah bersih dan sadar selama dua tahun; ia bekerja di rumah duka dan merupakan seorang penulis lepas.
backtranslation: Trish Skye says that she once had a problem, but has been clean and sober for two years; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.

src: Before joining Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays in a flat in London for several weeks.
mt: Sebelum bergabung dengan Bernard di Paris, Rosa tinggal di sebuah apartemen di London selama beberapa minggu.
backtranslation: Before joining Bernard in Paris, Rosa stayed in an apartment in London for a few weeks.

src: Now that she has no intention of honouring the agreement of her passport, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.
mt: Karena dia tidak berniat memenuhi perjanjian paspornya, yaitu untuk kembali ke Afrika Selatan dalam waktu satu tahun, dia secara terbuka memperkenalkan dirinya sebagai putri Burger.
backtranslation: Since she had no intention of fulfilling her passport agreement, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she publicly introduced herself as Burger's daughter.

src: This attracts the attention of the media and she attends several political events.
mt: Hal ini menarik perhatian media dan ia menghadiri beberapa acara politik.
backtranslation: This attracted media attention and he attended several political events.

src: Following Roy Hodgson's appointment, The Sun mocked his rhotacism manner of speech with a "Bwing on the Euwos!" front-page headline.
mt: Menyusul penunjukan Roy Hodgson, The Sun mengejek cara bicaranya yang rhotacism dengan tajuk utama halaman depan "Bwing on the Euwos!".
backtranslation: Following Roy Hodgson's appointment, The Sun mocked his rhotacism with the front-page headline "Bwing on the Euwos!".

src: The FA called the headline "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.
mt: FA menyebut tajuk berita itu "tidak dapat diterima" dan lebih dari 100 orang mengeluh kepada Komisi Pengaduan Pers.
backtranslation: The FA called the headline "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.

src: As a response to this, in 2017 boats off the British Columbia coast now have a minimum approach distance of 200 metres compared to the previous 100 metres.
mt: Sebagai tanggapan atas hal ini, pada tahun 2017, kapal-kapal di lepas pantai British Columbia kini memiliki jarak pendekatan minimum 200 meter dibandingkan dengan 100 meter sebelumnya.
backtranslation: In response to this, as of 2017, vessels off the coast of British Columbia now have a minimum approach distance of 200 meters compared to 100 meters previously.

src: This new rule complements Washington State's minimum approach zone of 180 metres that has been in effect since 2011.
mt: Aturan baru ini melengkapi zona pendekatan minimum 180 meter di Negara Bagian Washington yang telah berlaku sejak tahun 2011.
backtranslation: This new rule complements the 180-meter minimum approach zone in Washington State that has been in place since 2011.

src: If a whale approaches a vessel it must be placed in neutral until the whale passes.
mt: Jika paus mendekati kapal, kapal harus ditempatkan dalam posisi netral sampai paus tersebut lewat.
backtranslation: If the whale approaches the vessel, the vessel should be placed in a neutral position until the whale passes.

src: A number of locations in and around Dallas were used in production.
mt: Sejumlah lokasi di dalam dan sekitar Dallas digunakan dalam produksi.
backtranslation: A number of locations in and around Dallas were used in the production.

src: An office in Renaissance Tower was used for the OCP interior of; the company's exterior is Dallas City Hall, modified with matte paintings to appear taller.
mt: Sebuah kantor di Renaissance Tower digunakan untuk interior OCP; eksterior perusahaan adalah Balai Kota Dallas, yang dimodifikasi dengan lukisan matte agar terlihat lebih tinggi.
backtranslation: An office in the Renaissance Tower was used for OCP's interior; the company's exterior is Dallas City Hall, which was modified with matte painting to make it look taller.

src: The OCP elevator was that of the Plaza of the Americas.
mt: Lift OCP adalah lift di Plaza of the Americas.
backtranslation: Lift OCP adalah lift di Plaza of the Americas.

src: Although the traditional accounts are in agreement that Lydda almost immediately fell into obscurity following the founding of Ramla, narratives vary about the extent of Sulayman's efforts to transfer Lydda's inhabitants to Ramla, some holding that he only demolished a church in Lydda and others that he demolished the city altogether.
mt: Meskipun catatan-catatan tradisional sepakat bahwa Lydda hampir segera terlupakan setelah berdirinya Ramla, narasi-narasi berbeda mengenai sejauh mana upaya Sulaiman untuk memindahkan penduduk Lydda ke Ramla, beberapa menyatakan bahwa ia hanya menghancurkan sebuah gereja di Lydda dan yang lain menyatakan bahwa ia menghancurkan seluruh kota.
backtranslation: Although traditional accounts agree that Lydda was almost immediately forgotten after the establishment of Ramla, narratives differ as to the extent of Solomon's efforts to relocate the inhabitants of Lydda to Ramla, some stating that he only destroyed a church in Lydda and others stating that he destroyed the entire city.

src: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) noted Sulayman razed the houses of Lydda's inhabitants to force their relocation to Ramla and punished those who resisted.
mt: Al-Ya'qubi (wafat 839) mencatat bahwa Sulaiman meratakan rumah-rumah penduduk Lydda untuk memaksa mereka pindah ke Ramla dan menghukum mereka yang menentang.
backtranslation: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) records that Solomon razed the houses of the inhabitants of Lydda to force them to move to Ramla and punished those who resisted.

src: In the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the town of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the ruin of Lod
mt: Menurut al-Jahshiyari, Sulaiman "mendirikan kota al-Ramla dan masjidnya dan dengan demikian menyebabkan kehancuran Lod"
backtranslation: According to al-Jahshiyari, Solomon "founded the city of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the destruction of Lod".

src: Rolling Stone includes the album and several songs on various "best of" lists, such as:
mt: Rolling Stone memasukkan album dan beberapa lagu ke dalam berbagai daftar "terbaik", seperti:
backtranslation: Rolling Stone included the album and some songs in various "best of" lists, such as:

src: The Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) of the New York City Police Department arrived to free the police trapped inside the Stonewall.
mt: Pasukan Patroli Taktis (TPF) Departemen Kepolisian Kota New York tiba untuk membebaskan polisi yang terjebak di dalam Stonewall.
backtranslation: The New York City Police Department's Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) arrived to free the police trapped inside the Stonewall.

src: One officer's eye was cut and a few others were bruised from being struck by flying debris.
mt: Mata seorang petugas terluka dan beberapa petugas lainnya memar karena terkena puing-puing yang beterbangan.
backtranslation: One officer's eye was injured and several others were bruised by flying debris.

src: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog by the Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive:
mt: Bob Kohler, yang sedang mengajak anjingnya berjalan-jalan di dekat Stonewall malam itu, melihat TPF tiba:
backtranslation: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog near Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive:

src: Waziri and Afonja save Tawa.
mt: Waziri dan Afonja menyelamatkan Tawa.
backtranslation: Waziri and Afonja saved Tawa.

src: Waziri subsequently presents his account of the investigation to the British, who instruct him to withhold Aderopo's identity; he reluctantly agrees to do so for the sake of a peaceful independence.
mt: Waziri kemudian mempresentasikan laporannya tentang penyelidikan tersebut kepada pihak Inggris, yang menginstruksikannya untuk merahasiakan identitas Aderopo; ia dengan enggan setuju untuk melakukannya demi kemerdekaan yang damai.
backtranslation: Waziri then presented his report on the investigation to the British, who instructed him to keep Aderopo's identity secret; he reluctantly agreed to do so for the sake of peaceful independence.

src: Diller planned on a new Star Trek series forming the cornerstone for a new television network.
mt: Diller merencanakan serial Star Trek baru yang akan menjadi landasan bagi jaringan televisi baru.
backtranslation: Diller is planning a new Star Trek series that will be the cornerstone of a new television network.

src: Though Paramount was reluctant to abandon its work on the film, Roddenberry wanted to bring many of the production staff from the original series to work on the new show, titled Star Trek: Phase II.
mt: Meskipun Paramount enggan meninggalkan pekerjaannya pada film tersebut, Roddenberry ingin membawa banyak staf produksi dari serial aslinya untuk mengerjakan acara baru yang berjudul Star Trek: Phase II.
backtranslation: Although Paramount was reluctant to abandon its work on the movie, Roddenberry wanted to bring in many of the production staff from the original series to work on a new show called Star Trek: Phase II.

src: Chilean devil ray (M. tarapacana)
mt: Pari iblis Chili (M. tarapacana)
backtranslation: Chilean devil ray (M. tarapacana)

src: Cory Edwards chose to approach the film predominantly as an action/comedy, instead of as a typical animated film, and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of any age like many of the films produced by Pixar or Disney.
mt: Cory Edwards memilih untuk menggarap film ini sebagai film laga/komedi, alih-alih sebagai film animasi biasa, dan menulis naskah agar menarik bagi penonton dari segala usia seperti banyak film yang diproduksi oleh Pixar atau Disney.
backtranslation: Cory Edwards chose to shoot the movie as an action/comedy instead of a regular animated movie, and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of all ages like many movies produced by Pixar or Disney.

src: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons and The Incredibles (2004) have all been cited as inspirations for the film.
mt: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons, dan The Incredibles (2004) semuanya disebut sebagai inspirasi untuk film tersebut.
backtranslation: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons, dan The Incredibles (2004) semuanya disebut sebagai inspirasi untuk film tersebut.

src: By the early 1930s, Orizaba's typical route had remained virtually the same, though Nassau and Tampico were dropped as ports of call.
mt: Pada awal tahun 1930-an, rute umum Orizaba praktis tetap sama, meskipun Nassau dan Tampico tidak lagi menjadi pelabuhan singgah.
backtranslation: By the early 1930s, Orizaba's general route remained practically the same, although Nassau and Tampico were no longer ports of call.

src: It was in this period that American poet Hart Crane leapt to his death from Orizaba.
mt: Pada periode inilah penyair Amerika Hart Crane melompat hingga tewas dari Orizaba.
backtranslation: It was during this period that American poet Hart Crane jumped to his death from Orizaba.

src: At around noon on 27 April 1932, while the ship was headed to New York—some 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the Florida coast—Crane, clad in pajamas and overcoat, climbed the rail at the stern of the ship and plunged into the ocean.
mt: Sekitar tengah hari pada tanggal 27 April 1932, saat kapal tersebut menuju New York—sekitar 275 mil (443 km) di utara Havana dan 10 mil (16 km) dari pantai Florida—Crane, yang mengenakan piyama dan mantel, memanjat pagar di buritan kapal dan terjun ke laut.
backtranslation: Around noon on April 27, 1932, as the ship headed for New York-about 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) from the Florida coast-Crane, dressed in pajamas and a coat, climbed over the railing at the stern of the ship and dove overboard.

src: How you use your eyes, your position, and how you maximize camera angles... I didn't know those things before."
mt: Cara Anda menggunakan mata, posisi Anda, dan cara Anda memaksimalkan sudut kamera... Saya tidak tahu hal-hal itu sebelumnya.
backtranslation: The way you use your eyes, your position, and how you maximize the camera angle... I didn't know those things before.

src: To prepare for the role of a courtesan, she learned different styles of ballroom dances and trained in pole dance for three months.
mt: Untuk mempersiapkan perannya sebagai seorang pelacur, ia mempelajari berbagai gaya tarian ballroom dan berlatih tari tiang selama tiga bulan.
backtranslation: To prepare for her role as a prostitute, she studied various ballroom dance styles and practiced pole dancing for three months.

src: Critic Julia
mt: Kritikus Julia
backtranslation: Critic Julia

src: On August 26, George H. W. Bush toured devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.
mt: Pada tanggal 26 Agustus, George H. W. Bush mengunjungi daerah-daerah Louisiana yang hancur bersama Gubernur Edwin Edwards.
backtranslation: On August 26, George H. W. Bush visited devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.

src: President Bush remarked, "The destruction from this storm goes beyond anything we have known in recent years," but noted that damage was less severe than in Florida.
mt: Presiden Bush menyatakan, "Kerusakan akibat badai ini melampaui apa pun yang pernah kita alami dalam beberapa tahun terakhir," tetapi mencatat bahwa kerusakannya tidak separah di Florida.
backtranslation: President Bush stated, "The damage from this storm is beyond anything we've experienced in recent years," but noted that the damage was not as severe in Florida.

src: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish as a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes under this declaration.
mt: Setelah kunjungannya ke Louisiana, Presiden Bush hanya menyatakan Paroki Terrebonne sebagai daerah bencana, tetapi kemudian memasukkan 34 paroki lainnya dalam deklarasi ini.
backtranslation: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush only declared Terrebonne Parish a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes in this declaration.

src: When general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC polled 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 out of a total of 120 parliamentary seats.
mt: Ketika pemilihan umum diadakan pada bulan Juli 2003, CPP menang, sementara FUNCINPEC memperoleh 20,8 persen suara populer dan mengamankan 26 dari total 120 kursi parlemen.
backtranslation: When general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC gained 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 of the total 120 parliamentary seats.

src: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote compared with 1998.
mt: Ini menandai penurunan 11 poin persentase dalam pangsa suara populer FUNCINPEC dibandingkan dengan tahun 1998.
backtranslation: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote compared to 1998.

src: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their façades facing inwards; some examples are adorned with sculpture.
mt: Istana biasanya disusun mengelilingi satu atau lebih halaman, dengan fasadnya menghadap ke dalam; beberapa contoh dihiasi dengan patung.
backtranslation: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their facades facing inward; some examples are decorated with statues.

src: Some palaces possess associated hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as the royal residences of named rulers.
mt: Beberapa istana memiliki deskripsi hieroglif terkait yang mengidentifikasinya sebagai kediaman kerajaan dari penguasa yang disebutkan namanya.
backtranslation: Some palaces have associated hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as the royal residence of the named ruler.

src: The Inquisition post mortem held after Minsterworth's execution casts light upon his land-holding, much of which was held directly off John of Gaunt, son of King Edward III.
mt: Penyelidikan pascamortem yang diadakan setelah eksekusi Minsterworth menjelaskan kepemilikan tanahnya, yang sebagian besar dipegang langsung dari John of Gaunt, putra Raja Edward III.
backtranslation: Postmortem investigations held after Minsterworth's execution shed light on his land holdings, most of which were held directly from John of Gaunt, son of King Edward III.

src: This was particularly concentrated in the southwest of England.
mt: Hal ini terutama terkonsentrasi di barat daya Inggris.
backtranslation: It is mainly concentrated in the southwest of England.

src: Daniel feels ignored by his father, who has chosen Alexis to be his best man.
mt: Daniel merasa diabaikan oleh ayahnya, yang telah memilih Alexis untuk menjadi pendamping pengantin pria.
backtranslation: Daniel felt neglected by his father, who had chosen Alexis to be his best man.

src: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), MODE's seamstress, reunites with her husband Stuart (Derek Riddell) after leaving him in Scotland years ago; he reveals he is dying of a rare disease which requires a $100,000 operation.
mt: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), penjahit MODE, bertemu kembali dengan suaminya, Stuart (Derek Riddell), setelah meninggalkannya di Skotlandia bertahun-tahun yang lalu; Stuart mengungkapkan bahwa ia sekarat karena penyakit langka yang memerlukan operasi seharga $100.000.
backtranslation: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), a MODE seamstress, is reunited with her husband, Stuart (Derek Riddell), after leaving him in Scotland years ago; Stuart reveals that he is dying of a rare disease that requires a $100,000 operation.

src: Mistress Quickly rushes in, shouting that Ford has returned home unexpectedly with a retinue of henchmen to catch his wife's lover.
mt: Nyonya Quickly bergegas masuk, berteriak bahwa Ford telah kembali ke rumah secara tak terduga dengan rombongan anak buahnya untuk menangkap kekasih istrinya.
backtranslation: Mrs. Quickly rushed in, shouting that Ford had returned home unexpectedly with an entourage of his men to arrest his wife's lover.

src: Falstaff hides first behind the screen, but realizes that Ford will likely look for him there.
mt: Falstaff awalnya bersembunyi di balik layar, tetapi menyadari bahwa Ford kemungkinan akan mencarinya di sana.
backtranslation: Falstaff initially hid behind a screen, but realized that Ford would likely look for him there.

src: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.
mt: Para wanita itu mendesaknya untuk bersembunyi di keranjang cucian, dan dia melakukannya.
backtranslation: The women urged him to hide in the laundry basket, which he did.

src: In that year he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, by W. S. Gilbert, in performances of their one-act comic opera Trial by Jury.
mt: Pada tahun itu, ia dilihat oleh Arthur Sullivan dan, secara terpisah, oleh W. S. Gilbert, dalam pertunjukan opera komik satu babak mereka, Trial by Jury.
backtranslation: That year, he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, by W. S. Gilbert, in a performance of their one-act comic opera, Trial by Jury.

src: Impressed, they engaged him to play the comic lead in their new, full-length work, The Sorcerer.
mt: Terkesan, mereka mengajaknya untuk memainkan peran utama komik dalam karya baru mereka yang berdurasi penuh, The Sorcerer.
backtranslation: Impressed, they invited him to play the comic lead in their new full-length work, The Sorcerer.

src: Thereafter, Grossmith created the leading comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running comic operas until The Yeomen of the Guard, which closed in 1889.
mt: Setelah itu, Grossmith menciptakan peran komik utama di setiap opera komik Gilbert dan Sullivan yang telah lama dipentaskan hingga The Yeomen of the Guard, yang ditutup pada tahun 1889.
backtranslation: Thereafter, Grossmith created the lead comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running comic operas until The Yeomen of the Guard, which closed in 1889.

src: While returning home, Sudeep kidnaps and strangles Nani to death, making his death look like an accident.
mt: Saat kembali ke rumah, Sudeep menculik dan mencekik Nani hingga tewas, membuat kematiannya terlihat seperti kecelakaan.
backtranslation: Upon returning home, Sudeep kidnapped and strangled Nani to death, making her death look like an accident.

src: Before dying, Nani curses Sudeep, swearing to kill Sudeep if he tries to hurt Bindu.
mt: Sebelum meninggal, Nani mengutuk Sudeep, bersumpah akan membunuh Sudeep jika dia mencoba menyakiti Bindu.
backtranslation: Before dying, Nani cursed Sudeep, vowing to kill Sudeep if he tried to hurt Bindu.

src: Unaware of the incident, Bindu confesses her love for the dying Nani by phone; it is the last thing Nani hears before he dies.
mt: Tanpa menyadari kejadian itu, Bindu menyatakan cintanya kepada Nani yang sedang sekarat melalui telepon; itu adalah hal terakhir yang didengar Nani sebelum dia meninggal.
backtranslation: Unaware of the incident, Bindu professes her love to the dying Nani over the phone; it is the last thing Nani hears before she dies.

src: When Amir does not return, Tati and her aunt are worried: as Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two have run away together.
mt: Ketika Amir tidak kembali, Tati dan bibinya khawatir: karena Tati melihat Amir bersama Omi, dia takut keduanya telah kabur bersama.
backtranslation: When Amir does not return, Tati and her aunt are worried: since Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two have run away together.

src: Heartbroken, she intends to return to Cigading.
mt: Dengan patah hati, dia berniat untuk kembali ke Cigading.
backtranslation: Heartbroken, she intended to return to Cigading.

src: The rare formal social events in the Pooters' lives are particular magnets for misfortune.
mt: Acara sosial formal yang jarang terjadi dalam kehidupan keluarga Pooter menjadi daya tarik tersendiri bagi kesialan.
backtranslation: The infrequency of formal social events in the Pooter family's life was a particular attraction for bad luck.

src: They receive an invitation from the Lord Mayor of London to attend a ball at the Mansion House for "Representatives of Trade and Commerce".
mt: Mereka menerima undangan dari Lord Mayor London untuk menghadiri pesta di Mansion House untuk "Perwakilan Perdagangan dan Niaga".
backtranslation: They received an invitation from the Lord Mayor of London to attend a party at Mansion House for "Representatives of Trade and Commerce".

src: †Mammuthus primigenius (woolly mammoth)
mt: †Mammuthus primigenius (mamut berbulu)
backtranslation: †Mammuthus primigenius (mammoth berbulu)
